structure.unit: ARTICLE D. - STABLES AND HOLDING FACILITIES

text.section: It shall be unlawful for any person to operate a kennel in the City without possessing a valid kennel license.

Veterinary hospitals or clinics, research facilities where bona fide medical or related research (dental, veterinary, pharmaceutical or biological) is being conducted, humane shelters, and other animal establishments operated by state or local governments or which are licensed by Federal law are excluded from the kennel licensing requirements of this chapter. (Code 1959 , ยง4-26)
